features: Innovative Multi-Surface Vacuum: Deep clean with EUREKA whirlwind canister vacuum. Which features an integrated airflow control on the handle that can be easily switched at your fingertips. Suitable for: Carpet, Upholstery and Hard Floors. 960 watts.

Lightweight And Easy To Maneuver: Eureka whirlwind lightweight vacuum cleaner weighs only 8.15 ponds, It can easily maneuver under and around furniture and stairs thanks to its swivel steering and telescoping metal Wand.
2.5L Dust Container, No Maintenance Costs: No bags or filters required. The whirlwind has a Bagless design and uses washable filters. Rinse the filters as needed and you’re ready to go

2-In-1 Integrated Crevice Tool: Eureka whirlwind features a crevice tool integrated into the hose handle. It’s at your fingertips whenever you need and will never get lost. Easily disconnect the handle from the hose and switch between a crevice tool and a dusting brush.

Easy-To-Use: Spend more time cleaning and less time struggling with your vacuum cleaner. The Eureka whirlwind has automatic cord Rewind, saving your valuable time. The whirlwind has a 1 button release for easy dust cup emptying.
body.description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.Eureka WhirlWind Bagless Canister Vacuum Cleaner is the ultimate apartment essential for your home! With powerful suction and lightweight design, this cheap vacuum is perfect for cleaning multi-surfaces, making it the best vacuum cleaner for your apartment.The 3-liter washable dust cup and automatic cord rewind function ensures uninterrupted cleaning sessions, while the integrated airflow control on handle lets you easily switch between different surfaces, providing maximum suction power for carpets and gentle cleaning for hard floors.This vacuum comes with advanced swivel steering, long telescopic metal wand, multiple accessories and 16-feet-long cord, making it easy to maneuver and clean around furniture, stairs and cervices. Don't let dust and dirt take over your home - choose our dust cleaner today!If you have any questions, contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886.Warning: When using the vacuum cleaner, the floor brush may be clogged by hairs and dirt. We recommend cleaning the roller brush and the belt every 2 weeks.Long-term failure to clean may cause malfunction, or even risk of smoke and belt broken.Max Extended Reach: 9 ft

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eureka WhirlWind Features and Accessories Snap Fit Accessories Each part securely locks into place with a snap. The hose, tube, and brush include a locking fit so that everything can be easily attached & detached. Light Weight and Easy to Maneuver Item weighs Only 8.15 lbs. Carry this canister vacuum cleaner while you vacuum without breaking a sweat. Washable Components The reusable components of this vacuum cleaner requires nothing but rinse of the dust cup and filter as needed.

Eureka WhirlWind Features and Accessories 16 ft. Cord The extra long cord provides you a larger reach of cleaning. Easy to empty Dust Cup Equipped with a one button press, the 2.5L dust cup provides an easy emptying after cleaning. Cyclone Filtration System With the cyclone filtration system of this Eureka vacuum, you will enjoy high performance of air filtration.

Eureka WhirlWind Features and Accessories Multi Surface Cleaning Effortlessly switch to the proper setting for carpets, rugs and hard floors with just one push of switch. Tools on the Handle Easily use this vacuum cleaner for windows, baseboards, sofas, hard to reach nocks and more. Automatic Cord Rewind The automatic cord rewind function realizes the convenient use and rescues you from cord wrappings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: Just got it today. Replacing my old simplicity Scout we had for 15 years. Put it together in about 2 minutes total. Feels super sturdy, but not too heavy. Sucks great! worked very well on my tile and wood floor and the throw rug. Had to adjust suction for rug, so it didn't keep pulling it up, but once I found the right settings it was great. Sucks up larger pieces on the floor like crackers and chips. Easy to remove big wand for little wand to get messes on the chairs while doing the floor. It pops right off and goes back on easily. Like that the attachments are always attached and handy. Great for storage and convenient for use. Also like that you don't have to order bags or filters for it. That was always a pain with my old one. Also, you can see how full it is through the plastic. Very happy with it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I should have bought this European style vacuum cleaner years ago
reviews.reviewText: I have many vacuum cleaners and they are all upright American style. And they are all nearly useless. Not only you cannot go under the furniture or between the legs of chairs, they don't have suction power, they clog often and they're nearly useless on hardwood floors.Not this one! It does all what I just complained above well and it's light and easy to empty. It's so easy to go to corners, Under anything. It's also easy to remove the head(?) And just use the tube to get even in very narrow spaces. And the suction power is adequate. Definitely better than of those other vacuums that are twice this size.It's great for pets even though it's not advertised fur it. Hairs or feathers or even seeds from my birds... It takes everything.And it has retractable cord. Something that exists fur decades but most American style vacuums still don't have it.Oh, and it's very cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light and works good
reviews.reviewText: I've had the vacuum for a few weeks now. I vacuum our home almost daily since we have two German Shepherds.The positives:(1) lightweight,(2) works good on our ceramic and hardwood floors,(3) the flat head allows easy access under the furniture,(4) compact,(5) easy access to filter for cleaning.(6) long electrical cord(7) real easy to empty debris containerThe negatives:(1) the debris container is on the small side. I have to empty it a few times when vacuuming the entire house.(2) The bristles are made of a material that traps dog hairs so they need to be cleaned several times during usage.(3) no on-the-vacuum storage for attachments(4) suction is good but stronger would have been appreciatedOverall I like the vacuum. It'd a good vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reasonably well-built, priced, easy to carry, good suction power for its size.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this small portable vac because my 5-times as expensive, complicated, non-ergonomic, Dyson thing was too inconvenient to use. When I started using it, I was surprised at how easy it was to use and carry around. It does a better job of cleaning than the cumbersome Dyson type which I will throw away. It's very good and built with durable plastic parts. I don't think you'll be disappointed if you consider buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm so in love with this Eureka vacuum cleaner. Very versatile, easy to maneuver, light weight. I purchased this vacuum cleaner for my Airbnb's and it does the job perfectly. So easy to carry on, you can clean multiple surfaces in just a blink. Makes my life so easy. Beautiful machine and it's so powerful also. So easy to clean. I'm just so happy with this purchase. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Definitely a hard surface vacuum
reviews.reviewText: To say this vacuum is a carpet and hard surface vacuum is a bit of a stretch. I bought it because I have a dog (face hidden to protect his identity) who sheds a lot. I have mostly hard surfaces and eventually plan to only have hard surfaces. The suction is good but not enough to get pet hair out of a carpet. There is no beater bar on the floor tool. The full cup picture is from me vacuuming all of the floors in my house. Pretty good!Then I emptied the cup and use the beater bar tool and vacuumed the just carpet around where I have my dog crate. I got up quite a bit more in hair. The tool is too small (smaller than my hand) to practically use even just for the one room I have carpet. Fortunately it will be going soon also so I’ll keep it.It is lightweight which I really like. I also like that it is bagless and I can clean the filters. The suction is good on hard surfaces and I think it will work well for my furniture but I haven’t used it on that yet.It is a good vacuum for the price but should more accurately be described as a hard surface vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 30 Dec 23 update: I am really happy with this vac. It has actually exceeded my expectations by a wide margin. Finally found the manual that explained how to vary suction and how the floor tool works. Read the instructions! Fantastic on cat litter that gets into those places the Shark didn’t have the suction to lift. Easily emptied and cleaned. Washable filters are a great help. Changing my rating to 5⭐️Very good on hardwood and vinyl floors, but not so much on low pile area rugs. More suction than I expected and more than my Shark ( which I grown to loathe). This vac does not come with a crevice tool. The built in upholstery brush is adequate. Works great on cat hair/dander. Works great on household dust and kitchen (dry) spills. I was pleasantly surprised by the little vac.Cord reel is very good with a warning marker to prevent overextending, but the cord needs to be longer. I am 6-0' tall and the extension tube and hose length are fine. The suction head fits under ever stick of furniture I have, unlike the Shark, and I can vacuum under the beds with ease now. The vac is light enough for your aged granny to carry about the house.There is no method to hang up the hose when not in use nor is it stowable on the vac which is a nuisance. Eureka failed on this point as I suspect this vac will be used in households where space is at a premium. Not including a way to easily store or reduce the footprint of the vac when not in use is remiss.If you can overlook the cord length, lack of a crevice tool, and no storage method then you'll be pleased with the vac. It really is light as a feather and is easily maneuvered. I am hard to please, as one can tell, but I don't think this one will disappoint.

Siempre he visto las reseñas largas y hasta ahora nunca había sentido la necesidad de escribir una así. Esta vez simplemente no tengo otra opción.Tenemos un par de meses con una nueva mascota, adoptamos un Pastor Alemán y por más que lo cepillamos, los pelos volaban por todos lados. No bastaba barrer y trapear dos o tres veces por día, había pelos hasta en la sopa (o casi).Decidí hacer la compra de esta aspiradora luego de ver videos y comentarios comparando aspiradoras. Mi intención inicial era comprar una inalámbrica, pero viendo las reseñas, supe que la potencia de una aspiradora inalámbrica de un precio similar sería muy poca y que comprar una aspiradora inalámbrica que igualara a esta sería triplicar el precio o más. Comparando precio-calidad, nos decidimos por esta a pesar del cable.Una vez que llegó, nos sorprendió que el cable apenas y se nota. Es suficientemente largo para aspirar una habitación o dos sin problema. Además es retractil con solo apretar un botón, por lo que una vez que se ha terminado de usar no hay ningún cable a la vista.Tiene muchas opciones de uso diferente, para aspirar sillones y textiles, para aspirar con boquilla y para aspirar el suelo o la alfombra. La hemos usado practicamente cada tercer día y en mi casa no hay rastro de pelos de perro. Mi perro es el más feliz porque ahora no hay restricciones en cuanto a espacios o muebles a los que no se debe acercar.Sin duda ha sido una buena compra, pero la mejor parte es que mis hijos pequeños (de 8 y 9) la pueden usar. Es tan fácil de usar que no tienen ninguna dificultad o excusa para usarla, así que han aprendido a aspirar bajo mi supervisión.Si tienen hijos, definitivamente les servirá. Si tienen perros o gatos, la van a amar!!! Sea cual sea el caso, no sé cómo es que vivíamos antes de tener esta aspiradora en casa :D
Funciona bien en una casa pequeña, se calienta un poco pero supongo que es normal(no se protege), ideal para los pelos de perro, los absorve bastante bien, incluso los que estan en la sala y cojines.

Está aspiradora funciona muy bien, dudaba de su capacidad, pero al usarla si recoge bien el polvo juntos con los pelos de mi perrito, es ligera por lo que sin problema se puede mover para cualquier parte, el cable que trae es de buen tamaño, definitivamente me gustó, superó mis expectativas.

Not a bad little vacuum. It’s super light weight but has pretty good suction. I have a Bissell stick vac that was $30. It worked ok for picking up hair and dust but not much else. I wanted something similar ( small and light) but with better suction and can hold a little more before needing to be dumped out. This is exactly what I wanted. We have a small house with hard floors throughout and not much storage space. I have a Kirby but the hard floor attachment needed to be replaced after only 2 years and it’s heavy and not easy to store in a small house.This works really well for what I needed. Don’t know how long it will last but for $120 I was willing to take a chance on it. It’s easy to clean too and not very loud. Maybe as loud as a hair dryer. The hose could be a bit longer but it’s fine.
